Source.Name: haskell-boundedchan
Source.Summary: This library introduces BoundedChan. BoundedChans differ from Chans in that they are guaranteed to contain no more than a certain number of elements.
Source.Description: This library introduces BoundedChan. BoundedChans differ from Chans in that they are guaranteed to contain no more than a certain number of elements.
